item.title: Project 4: Quora Insincere Questions Classification
item.description: ü§î This project aims to classify whether a question asked on Quora is sincere or not using pre-trained NLP text embedding models from TensorFlow Hub. ‚û°Ô∏è Transfer learning is performed to fine-tune the models. üîó Link to GitHub Repository Data Preprocessing Class imbalance is treated with downsampling technique. The dataset is split into training and validation datasets with an 8:2 ratio. Model Building The text classification model is built using pre-trained NLP text embedding models from Tensorflow Hub.
